subject: Swimming
Alcohol Abuse
Drunken and Reckless Driving
Tests (Sobriety)
lead_paragraph: Taking a break from swimming after his second D.U.I. arrest, the Olympic champion Michael Phelps began a six-week program Sunday that he said “will provide the help I need to better understand myself.”
snippet: Taking a break from swimming after his second D.U.I. arrest, the Olympic champion Michael Phelps began a six-week program Sunday that he said “will provide the help I need to better understand myself.”
